metadata.title: CVE-2022-28352 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: WeeChat (aka Wee Enhanced Environment for Chat) 3.2 to 3.4 before 3.4.1does not properly verify the TLS certificate of the server, after certainGnuTLS options are changed, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers tospoof a TLS chat server via an arbitrary certificate. NOTE: this onlyaffects situations where weechat.network.gnutls_ca_system orweechat.network.gnutls_ca_user is changed without a WeeChat restart.

criterions.comment: weechat package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
